fields.headline: Letter: Sir Samuel Brittan obituary
fields.bodyText: Your obituary of Sir Samuel Brittan gave a good picture of the many varied facets of his life but one passion that was omitted was his support for electoral reform. Typically of Sam it was not just a vague commitment to proportional representation but a preference for the single transferable vote, the mathematics of which he not only understood but expounded, calling it the “super vote”.
